items.text: back of a length outside off, extra bounce this time and punched past cover point off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, opens the bat's face and works this away to cover point. No single this time though
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText: Xtremlyimpressi: "@naimul B'desh gets carried away very easily, remember against India, they bowled for less than 60 after such wonderful effort from bat "
items.text: back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot to cover. No run, and with that it's drinks.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText: Nasir to continue after the break. Sikandar Raza only four runs away from his ninth ODI fifty
items.text: full on middle stump, offspin down the leg side but tapped away to square leg with the turn
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Moor, 1 run

items.preText: Umer butt: "If zimbabwe played 50 overs with 8 down then they will able to make 230.and in bngladesh 230 is good total when u batting 1st"
items.text: good length on middle stump, worked off his toes to midwicket. No run
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, tentative step forward and attempts to work this behind square, bat-pad shot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, charges down the wicket and it's driven beautifully past cover. Races away to the extra-cover boundary. Theres the fifty
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, steps forward and taps to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle stump, almost a yorker. Dug away to long on. Raza will keep strike
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, comes down the ground and drives firmly back past the bowler. Straight to mid off, though
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText: MohammedAlam: "Bangladesh are in a hurry to get Raza Out, making them leak some easy runs. if Raza manages to stay till the end, Zimbabwe will have a fighting score."
items.text: back of a length outside off, backs away and cuts from near his body. Only to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, tapped away off the front foot to mid off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: slower ball on middle stump, hit down the ground to long on as they walk through for the single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, fended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, no run

items.text: full and slow outside off, nice change up to end the over. Defended with soft hands to mid off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, no run

items.preText: Shaon: "BD batsmen are taking some responsibility as we have seen on the recent days. Remember just few months back at Champions Trophy, Shakib and Riyad won the match against NZ from 33-4 to 268-5."
items.text: mix up! Is Raza run out? Full on middle, turned off his toes to square leg. Raza wants the quick run, but it's not there. He's halfway down before Moor asks him to turn back. Falls short by a few inches. Never a single, there.
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Sikandar Raza, OUT

dismissal.text: Sikandar Raza run out (Shakib Al Hasan/†Mushfiqur Rahim) 52 (99b 2x4 2x6) SR: 52.52

items.text: back of a length outside off, spins into him, punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: full outside off and sharply turns away, punched off the back foot once again. Straight to mid on
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Cremer, 1 run

items.preText: RM: "Raza and Pandya Run out at the same time " -- Too innings with a lot of potential wasted away in Centurion and Mirpur
items.text: good length outside off, turns into him, worked towards midwicket
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Moor, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, blocked back to Nasir off the front foot
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, muscled away off the back foot past square leg to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Nasir Hossain to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and turns this fine down the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, tapped with the bat's open face to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, mistimed down the ground to mid on. The bat turned in his hand
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Cremer, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched back past the non-striker to mid on. They want the quick run, forcing Mahmudullah to dive and throw in
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Cremer, 1 run
